description: Marcus Mojo is on the set this time, posing and smiling for the camera. As you probably already know, the lens loves his face and body almost as much as you do! Get a little behind the scenes glimpse and get to know Marcus a bit more intimately as he shows off his playful, relaxed personality. Enjoy!
title: On The Set  - Marcus Mojo
